name: Jumpy Rooftop
summary:
Running, jumping, and sprinting is what Jumpy Rooftop is all about!
Unlock all 32 or more hero characters, including a fireman, policeman, gym junkie, robber and more! Collect heroes during endless mode and earn bonus gems just for playing!
You can run through night and day, good and bad weather, rain hail or snow! Chickens, fireworks, water spouts and all sorts of crazy stuff will cross your road. Dodge missiles and other nasty stuff falling from the sky! If it's not a bird, it'll probably kill you!
